column4: Verify Known Folder Move syncs user files
column6: 1. Login to Windows; 2. Check OneDrive status; 3. Verify Desktop/Documents sync
column7: Files syncing; Green checkmarks; Files accessible

column6: 1. Send chat message; 2. Start meeting; 3. Share screen; 4. Record meeting
column7: Chat delivered; Meeting functional; Recording saved

column4: Verify PSTN calling via Teams Phone System
column5: Phone number assigned; Direct Routing configured
column6: 1. Make outbound call; 2. Receive inbound call; 3. Check voicemail
column7: Calls connect; Audio clear; Voicemail transcribed

column6: 1. Access site as owner; 2. Access as member; 3. Test external sharing
column7: Permissions enforced; External sharing blocked per policy

column4: Verify email flows between on-prem and cloud
column5: Hybrid Exchange configured; Both mailboxes active
column6: 1. Send email on-prem to cloud; 2. Send cloud to on-prem; 3. Verify delivery
column7: Email delivered both directions; No delays

column4: Verify MFA required for all M365 access

column5: CA policy enabled; Test device non-compliant
column6: 1. Access M365 from non-compliant device; 2. Verify block message
column7: Access denied; Compliance error displayed; Event logged

column4: Verify DLP blocks sensitive data sharing

column6: 1. Create document with SSN; 2. Attempt external sharing; 3. Verify block
column7: External sharing blocked; DLP tip displayed; Admin notified

column6: 1. Make test call; 2. Monitor call quality dashboard; 3. Check MOS score
column7: MOS score > 3.5; Jitter < 30ms; Packet loss < 1%

column6: 1. Monitor service health for 30 days; 2. Track incidents; 3. Calculate uptime
column7: Availability >= 99.9%; No critical outages
